name: Gravity Run (itch) (UOT Games)
description:
A classic jump and run game, where you cannot stop. Ever.

As you are traversing the obstacle course, every ten seconds your environment changes, adding interesting challenges. Don't touch the spiky parts and don't get stuck on walls - and most importantly: try to reach a new high score!

Controls are very minimalistic: use SPACE to jump, or SPACE in the air again to activate your jetpack. Move your mouse to point your flashlight.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 51: "every 10 seconds".
